entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 07:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 24 this morning. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Monday 20 February 2023
